item.title: Live to Run - Run to Live
item.description:
Live to Run - Run to Live

Post-transplant day 865. --Destination unknown.-- For the first time in my life, I have no idea where I'm going. Duke Admissions February-March 2016. February 18th thru 23rd for 1) high creatinine detected by both UNC [4.7] and Duke [4.9] on the 16th and 17th, respectively; 2) high blood pressure, noted on admission; 3) blood in stool.

item.title: Live to Run - Run to Live
item.description:
Live to Run - Run to Live

Post-transplant day #685. Survivors and heroes. There are just some days where I am absolutely humbled. Times when the face of true grace is revealed to me, when something divine is on display and if I pay attention, I'll learn something about what it means to be human.
